articles.title: India Vaccinations Cross 75 Crore Doses, 43% Coverage At This Rate By December - NDTV
articles.description: India's Covid vaccination coverage has crossed the 75-crore-doses mark, according to Union Health Minister Mansukh Mandaviya. At this rate, up to 43 per cent of the population will be fully covered by December, while the target was 60 per cent.
articles.content:
India launched a nationwide Covid vaccination drive in January this year.

articles.title: Virat Kohli e-mailed BCCI at midnight before Manchester Test cancellation, claims David Gower - India Today
articles.description: David Gower revealed that Virat Kohli had sent an email to the BCCI the night before the Manchester Test was called off due to the Covid-19 outbreak in the visiting camp.
